ComicInfo.Summary: Hard Questions: An angry Hulk shows up at X-Mansion looking for Xavier with only Beast and the New X-Men standing between he and his goal. The kids put up a decent fight but are no match for the jade giant. The real X-Men show up for support but Professor X puts a stop to the battle. He looks into Hulk's mind and views the horrors he endured on Planet Hulk. Hulk then tells him that he knows Xavier was not present at the meeting where the Illuminati banished him off planet. He asks Xavier that if he were at that meeting, how would he have voted.
